33.eng-name: Retiring to a Mosque for Remembrance of Allah (I'tikaf)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:that `Umar had vowed in the Pre-Islamic period to perform I`tikaf in Al-Masjid-al-Haram. (A subnarrator thinks that `Umar vowed to perform I`tikaf for one night.) Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said to `Umar, "Fulfill your vow

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا نَذَرَ فِي الْجَاهِلِيَّةِ أَنْ يَعْتَكِفَ ثُمَّ أَسْلَمَ
chapter.eng-name: Vow in the pre-Islamic period to perform I'tikaf
